Label.en: Kings had both the money and the motive!
Label.fr: Kings had both the money and the motive!
Label.es: Kings had both the money and the motive!

Label.en: After all, the whole point of money is to spend it on fancy armour, right!?
Label.fr: After all, the whole point of money is to spend it on fancy armour, right!?
Label.es: After all, the whole point of money is to spend it on fancy armour, right!?

Label.en: Well the owner of this helmet seems to have thought that way!

Label.es: Well the owner of this helmet seems to have thought that way!

Label.en: I can see that you're thinking like a king
